overview: As two rival Godfathers view to take control of the city, a hot-tempered family member kills two relatives of the opposing family, breaking the "Truce of Honor". Now the war begins! As a young boxer seeks revenge for his fianc√©e's death, the streets become a real-life battlefield... to settle the score!
tagline: There is no honor in death.. only in war
title: Fist of Honor
